function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate use of face masks and coverings leading to increased transmission of COVID-19","Impact":"Higher risk of COVID-19 spread within communities and populations","Mitigation":"Proper education and training on the correct usage of face masks and coverings","Technologies":"None specified","People":"General population, especially in crowded or high-traffic areas","Owner":"Health authorities, government agencies, employers"},{"Description":"Lack of consideration for disadvantaged or vulnerable groups when implementing face mask policies","Impact":"Increased risk of social and health disparities for vulnerable groups","Mitigation":"Priority access to high-quality masks and custom solutions for vulnerable populations","Technologies":"None specified","People":"Disadvantaged or vulnerable groups","Owner":"Health authorities, government agencies, community organizations"},{"Description":"Misunderstanding of the protective effect of face shields in preventing COVID-19 transmission","Impact":"False sense of security and inadequate protection against airborne transmission","Mitigation":"Clear guidelines on the appropriate use of face shields in conjunction with face masks","Technologies":"None specified","People":"General population, especially in high-risk environments","Owner":"Health authorities, government agencies"}]}
